class_notes:
(Freshmen Seminar - Limited to First Year Students Only)


This course will be taught entirely online and will meet synchronously both days.


This first-year seminar focuses on technology and social change in India, security and relations in the region, public health and the healthcare system, and climate change and its impacts. We begin with ancient India because Emory University's Michael C. Carlos Museum has a growing collection online.
course_description: For first-year students only. Entry level seminar focusing on a specific topic. May be repeated for credit when topic varies.
